name: vault-curate
summary: Interactive multi-stage knowledge triage workflow for Obsidian vault. 6 stages: Inventory → Health Check → Triage → Synthesis → Prune → Report. Subsumes /review-findings. Integrates Empirica calibration. Self-tuning frequency.
key_decisions: Archive = frontmatter flag, not file move (preserves Obsidian backlinks)
6 stages: Inventory, Health Check, Triage, Synthesis, Prune, Report
Self-tuning frequency based on decay rate
spec_digest: 6 content types, type-specific health signals, grouped triage with batch ops, synthesis trellis, dry-run prune, decay-based frequency recommendation
